DOC.brief_summary: Obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) common sleep disorder treat continuous positive airway pressure ( CPAP ) . Some OSA patient also suffer co-morbid insomnia . CPAP treatment may complicate patient co-morbid insomnia . This project evaluate effect self-help book insomnia patient treat CPAP OSA .
DOC.brief_title: Randomized Controlled Trial Self-help Book Insomnia Patients With Co-morbid OSA Insomnia
DOC.detailed_description: This study randomize control trial evaluate effect self-help book insomnia patient obstructive sleep apnea ( OSA ) co-morbid insomnia . 180 patient randomize either receive self-help book ( 90 patient ) sleep hygiene advice ( 90 patient ) . Patients fill questionnaire sleep health baseline three month . Furthermore , CPAP compliance OSA severity evaluate three month CPAP use . The aim evaluate whether self-help book improve sleep parameter CPAP compliance .
DOC.criteria: Patients diagnose OSA schedule CPAP treatment . Having comorbid insomnia . Less 18 year age Not fluent Norwegian
